## ğŸ› ï¸ Tech Stack

**Frontend**  
- Flutter (Dart)  
- Riverpod (State Management)  
- ZEGOCLOUD SDK (Video Calls)  

**Backend**  
- Firebase Authentication  
- Cloud Firestore (NoSQL Database)  
- Firebase Cloud Storage
